definition: the killing of animals (as for food), kill a large number of people indiscriminately
details:
noun
- the killing of animals (as for food)
- the savage and excessive killing of many people
= synonyms: massacre, mass murder, carnage, butchery
- a sound defeat
= synonyms: walloping, whipping, thrashing, drubbing, trouncing, debacle
verb
- kill a large number of people indiscriminately
= synonyms: massacre, mow down
- kill (animals) usually for food consumption
= example: kill (animals) usually for food consumption
= synonyms: butcher
